administrator.description: Flag to indicate whether this user account is an administrator

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

current.description: Flag to indicate whether this account should be set to the active account of the user

enabled.description: Flag to indicate whether this user is active within this account

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

reference.$ref: #/definitions/A reference to another resource in the system.

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

permissions.description: Set of permissions that are assigned to users in this group

func.description: Field function. Available for money, number and integers fields

label.description: The user-facing label of this field

sourceName.description: The name of this field in the data source

visible.description: Whether this field is visible in charts or not

canEdit.description: Indicates if members of this group can edit the referenced source

canRemove.description: Indicates if members of this group can delete the referenced source

fieldSecurity.description: If specified, configures the list of fields that are visible to users in this group

filters.description: Filters that will be applied to the source data for members of this group

source.description: A reference to a data source
source.$ref: #/definitions/A reference to another resource in the system.

Connection Object.description: A connection object is a specific SQL table, Elastic index, Solr core etc for a specific data source connection.  In addition to the description, each connection object will have connection specific fields that correspond to the _sourceParameter_ values for that connector

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

shared.description: Deprecated. True if this dashboard is visible to all users in your account.

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

connectionParameters.description: Parameters this connector uses when creating a connection

impersonationParameters.description: Parameters this connector uses when creating a connection with impersonation

sourceParameters.description: Parameters this connector uses when creating a source

Data Source Connector.description: Connectors represent the type of data sources that we can connect to. The type of connector and its parameters will be used to create a connection resource

accessTokenValiditySeconds.description: Access token validity interval in seconds

sourceFieldName.description: The name of the source field to filter on

type.description: The type of filter to apply

value.description: The value applied to the filter.  Used for eq/neq/le/lt/ge/gt filter types

values.description: The values applied to the filter.  Used for in/notin/between filter types

allowedValues.description: list of allowed values for parameter

label.description: label of parameter that will be displayed on ui

name.description: key of connection type parameter that should be sent to EDC

type.description: value type of the connection parameter

visible.description: whether parameter is visible in UI when creating connection

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

storageType.description: Storage Type of the connection type

user.description: New admin user for created account

users.description: List of admin user identifiers or self URI for created account

items.$ref: #/definitions/A reference to another resource in the system.

enabledFields.description: The list of fields that are visible to users in this group

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

filters.description: List of filters in this set

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

shared.description: True if this filter set is visible to all users in your account

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

protocol.description: Protocol by which to communicate with connector

required.description: Indicates whether this parameter is required to create the target connection

cacheable.description: True if the results from aggregated queries will be cached

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

dataRefreshCronExpression.description: Cron expression that determines how often new data will be be available in charts

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

live.description: True if this data source is live

liveRefreshRate.description: Refresh rate in time granularity units for live playing mode

sparked.description: True if this data source will be loaded in to Spark

canEdit.description: Indicates if members of this group can edit the referenced source

canRemove.description: Indicates if members of this group can delete the referenced source

fieldSecurity.description: If specified, configures the list of fields that are visible to users in this group

filters.description: Filters that will be applied to the source data for members of this group

administrator.description: Flag to indicate whether this user account is an administrator in their active account. Deprecated, will not be supported starting from 2.4 version

created.description: Details about who created this resource and when

enabled.description: Flag to indicate whether this user account is active in their active account

lastModified.description: Details about the last user who updated this resource and when

password.description: User password. This value is 'write-only' and will not be returned from the API.  You may provide the password when creating or updating a user.  Omit the password if you do not wish to set it.
